products.name: galaxy edge
products.desc: The phone comes with a 5.10-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1440 pixels by 2560 pixels,2600mAh battery,3GB RAM,32GB Internal Storage, 16 Mega Pixel Front and 5 Mega Pixel Rear Camera.

products.name: galaxy curve
products.desc: The phone comes with a 5.10-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1440 pixels by 2560 pixels,2600mAh battery,6GB RAM,128 GB Internal Storage, 16 Mega Pixel Front and 5 Mega Pixel Rear Camera.

products.name: iphone 6 s
products.desc: The Apple iPhone 6s is powered by 1.84GHz dual-core processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM. The phone packs 128GB of internal storage that cannot be expanded. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Apple iPhone 6s packs a 12-megapixel primary camera on the rear and a 5-megapixel front shooter for selfies.

products.name: iphone 5
products.desc: The Apple iPhone 5 is powered by 1.84GHz dual-core processor and it comes with 2GB of RAM. The phone packs 64GB of internal storage that cannot be expanded. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Apple iPhone 6s packs a 12-megapixel  primary camera on the rear and a 5-megapixel front shooter for selfies.

products.name: samsung fully automatic
products.desc: Fully automatic top load washing machine with 6 KG capacity. Special features are  air turbo, auto restart, child lock, magic filter, tempered glass window, drum type - diamond drum, pulsator- center jet, water level - 5 levels

products.name: samsung semi authomatic
products.desc: Semi automatic top load washing machine with 6 KG capacity. Special features are  air turbo, auto restart, child lock, magic filter, tempered glass window, drum type - diamond drum, pulsator- center jet, water level - 5 levels

products.name: LG fully automatic
products.desc: Fully automatic front loading washing machine with Capacity 7 kg. Special Features are Variodrum, LED display and foam detection system, Unbalanced load detection and multiple water protection

products.name: LG semi automatic
products.desc: Semi automatic front loading washing machine with Capacity 7 kg. Special Features are Variodrum, LED display and foam detection system, Unbalanced load detection and multiple water protection
